name: Some Game: Rebooted (Demo)
description:
Long story short, was making a game, lost the files, now I'm remaking it.

↓ Changelog ↓

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Demo 1.5

 Added username option in the settings. Go there and set it, it will appear in the hud above the coin count.

Added background to the UI. Hover your mouse over it to make it transparent.
